name: Wizard Quest (itch) (DeSent79)
description:
This story is about a boy named Alan who always wanted to become a wizard. 

When Alan was 16 he went to royal school of wizardy. He was sent to the contest to test his wits.

During the contest Alan meets Mel. They've joined together to pass the contest.

Keyboard: WASD and G
Gamepad: arrows and X (or square)

Hint: try checking the walls
